metadata.synopsis: Party comments on the remains of the battle with Ketheric from 100 years ago.Halsin in particular comments on how the forces from the Emerald Grove were here.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_A and then go to -24.5, 35.5, -5.5 and walk around to trigger the VB.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: There was a battle here once - a large one.
